Question
========
  
Suppose dummy coding is applied in a regression to determine whether math program A (Math_A) and math program B (Math_B) perform statistically significantly better than math program C. The estimated regression equation is: $Y’ = 55+(6*Math_A)–(4*Math_B)$. What is the average score of math program C? 
Answerlist
----------
* 57
* 55
* 52
* 51

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------
* Incorrect
* Correct
* Incorrect
* Incorrect
